text: István Szőke (13 February 1947 – 1 June 2022) was a Hungarian footballer. He played as a midfielder for Ferencvárosi TC from 1965 until 1974.Az örök játékos – nekrológ Szőke Istvánról He also played for the Hungary national team from 1969 until 1973, making 13 appearances. He was born in Budapest, Hungary. Szőke died on 1 June 2022 in Budapest of a stroke, aged 75.Elhunyt Szőke István, a Ferencváros örökös bajnoka ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Footballers from Budapest Category:Association football midfielders Category:Deaths from stroke
title: István Szőke
